abstract: NHL Roundup; Philadelphia Fliers defeat Boston Bruins, 2-1, lead by winger Jaromir Jagr, who scores his 1,600th NHL point after returning from three years in Russia. Other NHL items noted.
snippet: Jaromir Jagr returned after three years in Russia and scored in the Flyers’ 2-1 victory over the Bruins.
lead_paragraph: Jaromir Jagr returned after three years in Russia and scored in the Flyers’ 2-1 victory over the Bruins.

headline.print_headline: Jagr Scores 1,600th Point in First Game Back
headline.seo: N.H.L. Roundup: Jagr Scores 1,600th Point in First Game Back
